data.title: Electrique Fabrique (Razgrom Music Edition)
data.meta_description:
Electrique Fabrique (Razgrom Music Edition) by KRAFTman, released 26 January 2022

1. Waiting For The Day
2. Atomkraft
3. A Face I Knew
4. Gamma Rays
5. Call Me Up
6. Electrique Fabrique
7. Giro D'Italia
8. The Lonely Robots
9. Bundesautobahn 52
10. Florian
11. A Face I Knew (VST Mix) (Exclusive Track)
12. Gamma Rays (Radio Version) (Exclusive Track)
13. Giro D'Italia (Theme) (Exclusive Track)
14. Florian (Maschine Brennt Radio Remix) (Exclusive Track)
data.text:
1.

Waiting For The Day 07:24

Watch the time go by Driving through the night In the city streets Blinded by the light In the dead of night Walking in the rain Stars are in the sky Calling out your name In the morning sun Off to Mechelen Waiting for the train Journey starts again We all love the view Mountains far and wide Walking in the fields In the countryside People all around Photographic scene Landmarks show the way This could be a dream To the Promised Land Nothing left to say Now we head for home We're so far away Music & Lyrics by KRAFTman

2.

Atomkraft 04:04

Uranium Plutonium Radium Radioactive elements Uran Plutonium Radium Radioaktive elemente Electron Proton Neutron Nuclear energy Elektron Proton Neutron Kernenergie Contamination Radiation Mutation Atomic power Kontamination Strahlung Mutation Atomkraft Music & Lyrics by KRAFTman

3.

A Face I Knew 05:17

When you walked by me Through the summer haze I saw your picture postcards From bygone days Then when you moved, you walked towards me A distant shadow in the light Your cigarette was burning brightly And now you're almost out of sight Time waits for no one Watch the daylight fade I saw his dim lit features We can't erase Then when you moved, you walked towards me A distant shadow in the light Your cigarette was burning brightly And now you're almost out of sight Music & Lyrics by KRAFTman

4.

Gamma Rays 04:53

Gamma rays Are the most energetic form Of electromagnetic radiation Gamma radiation Is the product of radio-active atoms Gamma radiation Is one of three types of natural radio-activity Gamma rays Have high frequency electromagnetic radiation and carry a lot of energy Gamma rays Gamma rays Written by Sven Lauwers, Lyrics by KRAFTman

5.

Call Me Up 03:18

Call me up and talk to me On the line, on the line Call me up and turn the dial Make the call Make the call Re-connect and talk to me On the line, on the line Re-connect and dial again Talk all night Talk all night Call me up and talk to me On the line, on the line Call me up and turn the dial Make the call Make the call Music & Lyrics by KRAFTman

6.

Electrique Fabrique 03:56

Rythmique Musique Electrique Fabrique Rhythmisch Musik Elektrisch Gemacht Electrique Fabrique Electrique Fabrique Rythmique Musique Electrique Fabrique Rhythmisch Musik Elektrisch Gemacht Electrique Fabrique Electrique Fabrique Music & Lyrics by KRAFTman

7.

Giro D'Italia 03:27

The Giro D'Italia contains twenty stages and a prologue The race includes passages through mountains The first Giro D'Italia took place in 1909 The first race was won by Luigi Ganna The race is approximately 3,500 kilometres long It is a tradition that the race passes through the Alps There is approximately 45,000 metres of climbing During the 21 stages of the race Some of the stages take place in other countries Music & Lyrics by KRAFTman

8.

The Lonely Robots 03:14

Robotics develops machines, that can substitute, For humans, and replicate human actions Robots can take on any form, but some are made, To resemble humans, in appearance You are a robot I’m a robot too You are a robot I’m a robot too Robotics is a branch of engineering that involves The conception, design, manufacture, and operation of Robots Robots attempt to replicate walking, speech, Cognition, or any other human activity Day mne energiyu, i ya budu sluzhit' tebe (Give me energy, and I will serve you) Day mne energiyu, i ya budu sluzhit' tebe (Give me energy, and I will serve you) You are a robot I’m a robot too You are a robot I’m a robot too Robotics develops machines, that can substitute, For humans, and replicate human actions Music & Lyrics by KRAFTman

9.

Bundesautobahn 52 08:54

The journey starts We enter the autobahn The sky is lit by so many stars We listen to the radio And pass city after city We’re driving to Dusseldorf The journey is long And we travel through the night The rain is falling And the street lights glimmer We’re close to our destination We leave the autobahn Music & Lyrics by KRAFTman

10.

Florian 04:17

“Florian” You’re the voice of energy Tune into the melody Always there to lead the way Standing by the night cafe Florian, we miss you Florian, we do Florian, we miss you Florian, we do This could be your destiny Music is your legacy Harmonies and melodies Time is lost in memories Florian, we miss you Florian, we do Florian, we miss you Florian, we do Florian, we miss you Florian, we do Florian, we miss you Florian, we do Music & Lyrics by KRAFTman

11.

“A Face I Knew” When you walked by me Through the summer haze I saw your picture postcards From bygone days Then when you moved, you walked towards me A distant shadow in the light Your cigarette was burning brightly And now you're almost out of sight Time waits for no one Watch the daylight fade I saw his dim lit features We can't erase Then when you moved, you walked towards me A distant shadow in the light Your cigarette was burning brightly And now you're almost out of sight Music & Lyrics by KRAFTman

12.

“Gamma Rays” Gamma rays Are the most energetic form Of electromagnetic radiation Gamma radiation Is the product of radio-active atoms Gamma radiation Is one of three types of natural radio-activity Gamma rays Have high frequency electromagnetic radiation and carry a lot of energy Gamma rays Gamma rays Written by Sven Lauwers, Lyrics by KRAFTman
